title: How to Make S'more Bar Mix in a Jar

steps.headline: Layer the ingredients in a 1 quart jar, in this order:
steps.description: Graham cracker crumbs Brown sugar marshmallows chocolate chips

steps.headline: Attach a recipe card that says ; Empty contents of mix into a bowl.
steps.description: Melt 1/2 cup butter, add 1 teaspoon vanilla. Pour over dry ingredients, mixing well. Pour into a greased 9 inch (22.9 cm) square pan. Bake at 350 °F (177 °C) for 15 minutes. Makes 9-12 bars.

steps.headline: Bake the bars as directed on the recipe card.

text: Layer the ingredients in a 1 quart jar, in this order: Graham cracker crumbs Brown sugar marshmallows chocolate chips Attach a recipe card that says ; Empty contents of mix into a bowl. Melt 1/2 cup butter, add 1 teaspoon vanilla. Pour over dry ingredients, mixing well. Pour into a greased 9 inch (22.9 cm) square pan. Bake at 350 °F (177 °C) for 15 minutes. Makes 9-12 bars. Bake the bars as directed on the recipe card.
